txt.en:
'I do not know who would do such a thing to the good folk of Staddle, but I know a remedy to cleanse the poison from their well-water. 

'Bring me some handfuls of the wildflowers that grow near the Yellow Tree, south-west of the Spring. The blossoms possess a cleansing virtue that will purge the poison from the well.

'The Yellow Tree was a place of peace in times past, but now it is home to fearsome creatures. You must be courageous if you are to collect the flowers I require.'
'Yes, these are just what I needed. This will take but a moment. The water was indeed poisoned, but the blossoms of these wildflowers will drive the poison away.'
'Time is of the essence, [placeholder]. Return to me when you have the flowers and not before.'
'Time is of the essence, [placeholder]. Return to me when you have the flowers and not before.'
Seeking help, you brought a bucket of fouled well-water to the River-maiden of Silverwater Spring.
Collected wildflowers from the Yellow Tree ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The Yellow Tree is south-west of the Silverwater Spring.\n\nWillowsong requires some handfuls of wildflowers if she is to cleanse the well's water of poison.
Collect wildflowers from the Yellow Tree ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
